description:
Description :
        Ichika, a male, from some reason has been able to move the IS a weapon only women can use. And now, he is to enter the IS Academy, an institute designed to develop the skills of said pilots.Join the childhood friend Houki, the aristocrat Cecilia, the transferee Rin, the boyish Charles, the somewhat scary Laura, the ever girl-surrounded Ichika and their friends in this school of love-comedy!Related:- Infinite Stratos(http://mangapark.com/search?q=infinite-stratos)- IS!(http://mangapark.com/search?q=is)
